Posts.Content: I just read an article this morning, on cbsnews.com/health, stating that Jewish women usually test positve for those 2 specific gene mutation and because of that, they are 85% more likely to develop breast cancer later in life.
Posts.Title: Braca 1 & 2 genetic marker test for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Young girls CAN get breast cancer - so can men! Cancer, any type and form, does not discriminate! I would go and have a mammogram done and see what's up. If it's nothing, you'll feel more at ease, mentally, and if it is something, knock on wood, you'll finally know what's wrong and go from there. GOOD LUCK!!!
Posts.Title: Im 23 - could i have breast cancer??

Posts.Content: Have you seen a doctor? I would see a doctor so that you know for sure to avoid getting yourself sick from worrying. As far as I know, the whole bra/breast cancer thing is just an old wives tale. I'm 25 and I have been wearing a bra (some times overnite) since I was 10 and my breasts are fine. Check with your doctor though, it could be nothing. GOOD LUCK !!
Posts.Title: HELP I'm 16 and i just found a lump in my breast!!!!!!
